channel.title: Concealed 525
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://theconcealed.co.cc/Project%20Thread/MainBanner.png[/img] The Concealed 525 Main Project Introduction: Hello there, I am Jcc_jcat, the server head and head programmer in the Concealed RSPS Server Series Group. Our most pride filled server, the 525, is a server that has been worked on since August of 2009. We have started off as a simple 525 server based of RuneScorp, a pretty happy server. It then came to me that all 525's ever had was PVP, so the first update I added to my first 525 was my woodcutting base, then my firemaking, then mining. I know they weren't the best but working for the past months, I have improved my Java skills and I know that this server will be a success. This server is based off the Rs2Hd Release by Luke. I have a converted RS2HD 276 with most packets converted, but I didn't feel completely satisfied. There was a lot more content in the 276 and I wasn't completely familiar with all of them. So I stuck with Luke Release (<3 it by the way, I thank you so much ^_^). I started with adding the NPC Update Masks (thanks Mage_Owner) because I've always wanted to be one of the first people with NPC Combat on a 525 (Damnit Pie & Origin <3). Its always been my intention to do a perfect combat system so I can work with all the skilling and other features. Well, as a quick solution to quick combat, 2 words, Entity Combat. My combat system was written completely from scratch using events and Entity. One class, 2 Fields: EntityCombat(e1, e2);. Ok, I can tell half of you are already bored with this thread so lets start with our features now shall we. Staff -Main Programmer/Head: Jcc_Jcat Assisting Administrators: Izual and Ultimate Assisting Programmers: Izual and Rocaita Official/Head Testers: Ultimate and Da_Sad_Truth Features: -Before I started logging dates- -HD Server-(Lukes Base has it)- -NPC Masks: Force Chat, Entity Face, Shift, GFX, Hits, Face Loc, and Animate.- [IMG]http://theconcealed.co.cc/Project%20Thread/NPC%20Masks.png[/img] -Item Equiping- [IMG]http://theconcealed.co.cc/Project%20Thread/Equiping.png[/img] -Banking- [IMG]http://theconcealed.co.cc/Project%20Thread/Banking.png[/img] -Animate Interface(Dialogues and Item on Interface ;)) - Creds to Edu [IMG]http://theconcealed.co.cc/Project%20Thread/Dialogue.png[/img] -NPC Following & Summoning Base- [IMG]http://theconcealed.co.cc/Project%20Thread/Summand%20Following.png[/img] -ENTITY COMBAT SYSTEM- -Read More Info on this Below- -Clan Chat Base- I actually prefer it in the Quest Tab. You can add so many lines and buttons to it ^_^: [IMG]http://theconcealed.co.cc/Project%20Thread/Clan%20Chat.png[/img] -Private Messaging- I am having some errors with it so I can't really say its full (Pming isn't working atm >.<) Shopping [IMG]http://theconcealed.co.cc/Project%20Thread/Shopping.png[/img] -Jc Script- Its similar to the irc RuneScript bot, Just use the ! and a command and watch it roll. When a basic GE system is built, you can grab the current prices and use the merch tools like the !calc command. I wanted to import a basic IRC Client into the server, but I thought it was too much. Hell, if people want it, I'll add it ^_^, I'll be fun.
Out of 100% boredom, I wrote a server gui (control panel) for the Concealed 525 project. [IMG]http://theconcealed.co.cc/Project Thread/GUI1.png[/img] [IMG]http://theconcealed.co.cc/Project Thread/GUI2.png[/img] More on this system below. [IMG]http://theconcealed.co.cc/Project Thread/GUI3.png[/img] This is the server connection settings for IRC. More Info below [IMG]http://theconcealed.co.cc/Project Thread/GUI4.png[/img] The Player List to the right supports (or will support, I forgot to make it show the data) players listed in this format: Index - Name - World (1 or 2) - Rights [IMG]http://theconcealed.co.cc/Project Thread/GUI5.png[/img] The Range button can be toggled on or off to support the NPC walking. The NPC spawned here are not saved to the NPC.xml but instead , their details are printed into a pending.txt file where we can grab it if we want it. It also spawns the NPC in the server. I will be adding an Object Adding System Later [IMG]http://theconcealed.co.cc/Project Thread/GUI6.png[/img] Didn't Like the normal Command Prompt look so I hid that windows and all the data gets printed here. The Restart Server will close the GameEngine and recall the main method. Useful if the server crashes and i don't feel like navigating to the server folder. Serber destruct just closes the engine. [IMG]http://theconcealed.co.cc/Project Thread/IRCSystem.png[/img] Really not that hard. Its an IRC Bot that will respond to certain commands and will state when the GE updates (when we implement) when a certain player has completed a quest, when a certain player has killed a boss, when a certain player get their ass kicked by a boss, and when a player gets punishehed via muting or banning. Criticisms are welcome, flaming isn't. I know it isn't much but hey, a lot of people don't do or can't do it.
------------------- ENTITY COMBAT SYSTEM: Supports all three combat Systems: Player vs Player Npc vs Npc Player vs Npc [IMG]http://theconcealed.co.cc/Project%20Thread/PvN.png[/img] What I started was making the NPC class abstract inorder to separate a normal NPC and a familiar (you are technically playing this "NPC") Inorder to make life easier but it was too much for too little. Well here are my combat features right now. -Retaliation Support ( Auto for NPCs, Players have the button) -Summoning Combat Support [IMG]http://theconcealed.co.cc/Project%20Thread/NVN.png[/img] (Graardor was my familiar in this case, and holy ****, did he just max :o) [IMG]http://theconcealed.co.cc/Project%20Thread/PVPwSumm.png[/img] Well, thats it for now ^_^ [/CENTER]

item.title: Concealed 525
item.dc:creator: @Jadscape Jadscape
item.description:
@Jadscape wrote:

[CENTER]
The Concealed 525 Main Project

Introduction:
Hello there, I am Jcc_jcat, the server head and head programmer in the Concealed RSPS Server Series Group. Our most pride filled server, the 525, is a server that has been worked on since August of 2009. We have started off as a simple 525 server based of RuneScorp, a pretty happy server. It then came to me that all 525’s ever had was PVP, so the first update I added to my first 525 was my woodcutting base, then my firemaking, then mining. I know they weren’t the best but working for the past months, I have improved my Java skills and I know that this server will be a success.
This server is based off the Rs2Hd Release by Luke. I have a converted RS2HD 276 with most packets converted, but I didn’t feel completely satisfied. There was a lot more content in the 276 and I wasn’t completely familiar with all of them. So I stuck with Luke Release (<3 it by the way, I thank you so much ^_^). I started with adding the NPC Update Masks (thanks Mage_Owner) because I’ve always wanted to be one of the first people with NPC Combat on a 525 (Damnit Pie & Origin <3). Its always been my intention to do a perfect combat system so I can work with all the skilling and other features. Well, as a quick solution to quick combat, 2 words, Entity Combat. My combat system was written completely from scratch using events and Entity. One class, 2 Fields: EntityCombat(e1, e2);.
Ok, I can tell half of you are already bored with this thread so lets start with our features now shall we.

Staff
-Main Programmer/Head: Jcc_Jcat
Assisting Administrators: Izual and Ultimate
Assisting Programmers: Izual and Rocaita
Official/Head Testers: Ultimate and Da_Sad_Truth

Features:
-Before I started logging dates-
-HD Server-(Lukes Base has it)-
-NPC Masks: Force Chat, Entity Face, Shift, GFX, Hits, Face Loc, and Animate.-

-Item Equiping-

-Banking-

-Animate Interface(Dialogues and Item on Interface ;)) - Creds to Edu

-NPC Following & Summoning Base-

-ENTITY COMBAT SYSTEM-
-Read More Info on this Below-

-Clan Chat Base-
I actually prefer it in the Quest Tab. You can add so many lines and buttons to it ^_^:

-Private Messaging-
I am having some errors with it so I can’t really say its full (Pming isn’t working atm >.<)

Shopping

-Jc Script-
Its similar to the irc RuneScript bot, Just use the ! and a command and watch it roll. When a basic GE system is built, you can grab the current prices and use the merch tools like the !calc command. I wanted to import a basic IRC Client into the server, but I thought it was too much. Hell, if people want it, I’ll add it ^_^, I’ll be fun.

Out of 100% boredom, I wrote a server gui (control panel) for the Concealed 525 project. [IMG]http://theconcealed.co.cc/Project Thread/GUI1.png[/img] [IMG]http://theconcealed.co.cc/Project Thread/GUI2.png[/img] More on this system below. [IMG]http://theconcealed.co.cc/Project Thread/GUI3.png[/img] This is the server connection settings for IRC. More Info below [IMG]http://theconcealed.co.cc/Project Thread/GUI4.png[/img] The Player List to the right supports (or will support, I forgot to make it show the data) players listed in this format: Index - Name - World (1 or 2) - Rights [IMG]http://theconcealed.co.cc/Project Thread/GUI5.png[/img] The Range button can be toggled on or off to support the NPC walking. The NPC spawned here are not saved to the NPC.xml but instead , their details are printed into a pending.txt file where we can grab it if we want it. It also spawns the NPC in the server. I will be adding an Object Adding System Later [IMG]http://theconcealed.co.cc/Project Thread/GUI6.png[/img] Didn't Like the normal Command Prompt look so I hid that windows and all the data gets printed here. The Restart Server will close the GameEngine and recall the main method. Useful if the server crashes and i don't feel like navigating to the server folder. Serber destruct just closes the engine. [IMG]http://theconcealed.co.cc/Project Thread/IRCSystem.png[/img] Really not that hard. Its an IRC Bot that will respond to certain commands and will state when the GE updates (when we implement) when a certain player has completed a quest, when a certain player has killed a boss, when a certain player get their ass kicked by a boss, and when a player gets punishehed via muting or banning.

Criticisms are welcome, flaming isn’t.
I know it isn’t much but hey, a lot of people don’t do or can’t do it.

ENTITY COMBAT SYSTEM:
Supports all three combat Systems:

Player vs Player
Npc vs Npc
Player vs Npc

What I started was making the NPC class abstract inorder to separate a normal NPC and a familiar (you are technically playing this “NPC”) Inorder to make life easier but it was too much for too little. Well here are my combat features right now.

-Retaliation Support ( Auto for NPCs, Players have the button)
-Summoning Combat Support

(Graardor was my familiar in this case, and holy ****, did he just max :o)

Well, thats it for now
[/CENTER]

Read full topic
